abstract: Requests made by Manhattan jury deliberating in murder trial against Pedro Hernandez suggest that jury is scrutinizing police methods used in obtaining Hernandez's confession that he killed 6-year-old Etan Patz in 1979.
lead_paragraph: Jurors also want to review the testimony of the prosecutor who decided not to record the interrogation of Pedro Hernandez, the man charged with killing the boy.

headline.main: Jury in Etan Patz Case Focuses on Confession and Video
headline.print_headline: Patz Jury Revisiting Confession and Video

snippet: Jurors also want to review the testimony of the prosecutor who decided not to record the interrogation of Pedro Hernandez, the man charged with killing the boy.
